title: A1707 clean dumps required
message: I have 2 A1707 1 with board number 820-00928-a and 1 with 820-00928-04 Im looking for clean bios for both but have no luck with search function on the forum.

title: A1707 clean dumps required
message:
What exact problems do you have?
Usually need to clean ME of backup BIOS.
Upload them somewhere, if you don't have Medusa programmer...

title: A1707 clean dumps required
message:
"What exact problems do you have?"
Symptoms???
Any history available, liquid signs?

If you use Google Drive, you should set correct permissions...

title: A1707 clean dumps required
message: No liquid spills.  1 is very slow to post logo and slow loading. Second one is black screen.  these should be shareable links.

title: A1707 clean dumps required
message:
"these should be shareable links"
Not at all, asked me for permission...

title: A1707 clean dumps required
message: Got them now, I will try to fix later today...

title: A1707 clean dumps required
message:
Here is the clean ME BIOS for first board.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1gNNXNFkPmmqJr4NOhqkemOSs3wYoXOAH/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

The second one should have another problem, if no internal image.
To discard BIOS problem, just try above file.
It should work, good for test; maybe machine will be slowly.

title: A1707 clean dumps required
message: Thank you. I will try that out.
